system.description:
Clerics who reach the sixth level may obtain a doctorate from a university. Beyond prestige, this degree confers special advantages. The character can distribute 6 extra points among Science skills (although a single skill can only be increased by 3), or learn a completely new Science.

Second, they will either be granted custody of a holy relic or an important ecclesiastic holding, and both benefits will also be accompanied by 2d4*10 armed retainers.
